title: Birthday RSVP Full Stack App
description: A React-based website for my dad's 50th birthday celebration, featuring a landing page with event details, an RSVP form, and an admin page to manage guest information. Includes responsive design, countdown timer, and animated UI components.

title: JamWith
description: JamWith is a dynamic music collaboration platform that connects musicians worldwide. Discover, collaborate, and create music together in a vibrant online community, fostering creativity and musical partnerships.

title: Codagotchi
description: A VS Code extension that integrates a Tamagotchi-like experience where coding activities help nurture and evolve a digital pet. Users can level up their Codagotchi by completing coding tasks, participating in challenges, and maintaining a consistent coding schedule. The project utilizes GitHub usernames for friend functionality, enabling users to connect and compare their Codagotchi progress.

title: ShowSeek Backend
description: A comprehensive platform for movie and TV show enthusiasts to discover, track, and share media. The vibe feature allows users to share their current mood and receive personalized recommendations based on their mood and preferences.

title: notalim Portfolio
description: A portfolio website showcasing a range of projects with detailed information and interactive features. It includes various sections such as a project gallery, contact information, and integration with external APIs for dynamic content.

title: notalim Portfolio backend
description: The backend for the notalim Portfolio website, providing the API for the frontend to interact with the database and external services.

title: DAIA: Diabetes Alert System
description: A blood sugar level monitoring system that sends alerts to the contacts's phone when their blood sugar level is too high or too low.

title: Swoons: A Dating Platform
description: A web application facilitating unique dating experiences with a focus on creativity and social interaction.

title: Snoops: A Dog Adoption Platform
description: A platform streamlining the dog adoption process with user-friendly interfaces for adopters and shelters.

title: Pinemelon Instagram Scraper
description: An Instagram likes and comments data scraping script, while I worked at Pine,melon.

title: Pinemelon Denver Map
description: A stylized map of Denver neighborhoods, showcasing various statistics. Made for Pinemelon

title: Genius Thief
description: A Python script for scraping lyrics data from the Genius website using the Genius API.

title: CartiBot
description: A Discord bot based on Playboi Carti, featuring commands related to the artist's tweets, song lines, and quotes.

title: Intermediate Statistics CA Notes
description: Notes for an Intermediate Statistics course, aiding students in learning R, RStudio, and R Markdown.

title: Stdio Replica
description: A replication of the stdio header, demonstrating low-level programming and I/O operations in C.
